trans-unit.source: Defines row-specific properties that apply to <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> elements.
trans-unit.target: Define as propriedades específicas de linha que se aplicam a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref> elementos.

trans-unit.source: You must set a RowDefinition for each row in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: Você deve definir um RowDefinition para cada linha em <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>

trans-unit.source: When you set a row-specific RowDefinition, you assign unique sizing properties to each row.
trans-unit.target: Quando você define RowDefinition uma linha específica, você atribuir propriedades de dimensionamento exclusivo para cada linha.

trans-unit.source: To set a group of RowDefinition elements by using code, add the RowDefinition to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Para definir um grupo de elementos de RowDefinition por meio de código, adicione RowDefinition para <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection>

trans-unit.source: The RowDefinition class exposes only height properties.
trans-unit.target: A classe RowDefinition expõe apenas as propriedades de altura.

trans-unit.source: To set width properties in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>, create an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: Para definir propriedades de largura de uma <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>Crie uma instância de <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the calculated height of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que representa a altura calculada do <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you use these values in the same code example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A> value takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A> value, which in turn takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usar esses valores no exemplo de código, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A>valor tem precedência sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A>valor, que por sua vez, tem precedência sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the ActualHeight of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando você adicionar ou remover linhas ou colunas, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>para todos os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>elementos e ActualHeight de todos os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>elementos se torna zero até <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the calculated height in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Double>que representa a altura calculada em pixels independentes de dispositivo.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 0.0.

trans-unit.source: Gets the calculated height of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"></xref> element, or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref> value of a row that is defined by the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a altura calculada de uma <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"> </xref> elemento ou conjuntos a <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"> </xref> valor de uma linha que é definida pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType> is <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>é <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>.</xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType> </xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>

trans-unit.source: When you use these values in the same code example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A> value takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A> value, which in turn takes precedence over the Height value.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usar esses valores no exemplo de código, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A>valor tem precedência sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A>valor, que por sua vez, tem precedência sobre o valor da altura.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando você adicionar ou remover linhas ou colunas, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>para todos os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>elementos e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A>de todos os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>elementos se torna zero até <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # Informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"></xref> that represents the height of the row.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.GridLength"> </xref> que representa a altura da linha.

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.0.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 1.0.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the maximum height of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que representa a altura máxima de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you use these values in the same code example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A> value takes precedence over the MaxHeight value, which in turn takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usar esses valores no exemplo de código, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A>valor tem precedência sobre o valor MaxHeight, que por sua vez, tem precedência sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando você adicionar ou remover linhas ou colunas, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>para todos os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>elementos e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A>de todos os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>elementos se torna zero até <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value equal to or greater than `0.0034` but equal to or less than `160000`.
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do atributo XAML ``` - or - ``` # # XAML valores *duplo* representação de cadeia de caracteres um valor maior que ou igual a `0.0034` mas igual a ou menor `160000`.

trans-unit.source: An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um valor não qualificado é medido em pixels independentes de dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: Cadeias de caracteres não precisam explicitamente incluir pontos decimais.

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* um *duplo* valor conforme descrito acima, (com exceção da `Auto`) seguido por um dos seguintes especificadores de unidade: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: `px`(padrão) é [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` polegadas; em 1 = = 96px `cm` centímetros; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` pontos; 1pt==(96/72) px # # informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the maximum height.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Double>que representa a altura máxima.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the minimum allowable height of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que representa a altura mínima permitida de um <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: When you use these values in the same code example, the MinHeight value takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A> value, which in turn takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Quando você usa esses valores no mesmo exemplo de código, o valor de MinHeight tem precedência sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A>valor, que por sua vez, tem precedência sobre o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MaxHeight%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you add or remove rows or columns, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A> for all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> elements and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> of all <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> elements becomes zero until <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: Quando você adicionar ou remover linhas ou colunas, o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>para todos os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>elementos e o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A>de todos os <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>elementos se torna zero até <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A>é chamado.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Measure%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.ActualHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.ActualWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML Values *double* String representation of a value equal to or greater than `0.0034` but equal to or less than `160000`.
trans-unit.target: # # Uso do atributo XAML ``` - or - ``` # # XAML valores *duplo* representação de cadeia de caracteres um valor maior que ou igual a `0.0034` mas igual a ou menor `160000`.

trans-unit.source: An unqualified value is measured in device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: Um valor não qualificado é medido em pixels independentes de dispositivo.

trans-unit.source: Strings need not explicitly include decimal points.
trans-unit.target: Cadeias de caracteres não precisam explicitamente incluir pontos decimais.

trans-unit.source: *qualifiedDouble* A *double* value as described above, (excepting `Auto`) followed by one of the following unit specifiers: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.
trans-unit.target: *qualifiedDouble* um *duplo* valor conforme descrito acima, (com exceção da `Auto`) seguido por um dos seguintes especificadores de unidade: `px`, `in`, `cm`, `pt`.

trans-unit.source: `px` (default) is [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` is inches; 1in==96px `cm` is centimeters; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` is points; 1pt==(96/72) px ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: `px`(padrão) é [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] `in` polegadas; em 1 = = 96px `cm` centímetros; 1cm==(96/2.54) px `pt` pontos; 1pt==(96/72) px # # informações de propriedade de dependência | | | |-|-| | Campo de identificador | | | Definir propriedades de metadados `true`| Nenhum |

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the minimum allowable height.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Double>que representa a altura mínima de permitido.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 0.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifica o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight*>DependencyProperty.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition.MinHeight*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the offset value of this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que representa o valor de deslocamento deste <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Double> that represents the offset of the row.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Double>que representa o deslocamento da linha.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão é 0.0.
